// Source: configWithDifferentApply{}
//
// Generated by this command:
//
//	go-options -func applyDifferent -option DifferentOption -new=false configWithDifferentApply
//

package test

type ApplyDifferentOptionFunc func(c *configWithDifferentApply) error

func (f ApplyDifferentOptionFunc) apply(c *configWithDifferentApply) error {
	return f(c)
}

func applyDifferent(c *configWithDifferentApply, options ...DifferentOption) error {
	for _, o := range options {
		if err := o.apply(c); err != nil {
			return err
		}
	}
	return nil
}

type DifferentOption interface {
	apply(*configWithDifferentApply) error
}

type differentOptionNamespace struct{}

var DifferentOptionNamespace differentOptionNamespace
